guide.introduction: I am going to show you how to whip up an easy costume using very basic sewing skills.
guide.introduction_rendered:
I am going to show you how to whip up an easy costume using very basic sewing skills.

Tools
  • Sewing machine or fabric glue
  • felt (2 yards of maroon, 1 1/2 yards of white, 1 square foot of yellow, and long strips of pink)

lines.text: In colored chalk, sketch out a cracked egg onto your white felt and cut it out.
lines.text_raw: In colored chalk, sketch out a cracked egg onto your white felt and cut it out.

lines.text: Mark and cut an X for your head to go through.
lines.text_raw: Mark and cut an X for your head to go through.

lines.text: Free hand or trace an egg yolk that measures about 12" in diameter. Cut it out and pin and sew it to the belly area of your egg white.
lines.text_raw: Free hand or trace an egg yolk that measures about 12" in diameter. Cut it out and pin and sew it to the belly area of your egg white.

lines.text: Cut a 5 1/2" x 1 1/2" piece of maroon felt and add wavy lines to the sides.
lines.text_raw: Cut a 5 1/2" x 1 1/2" piece of maroon felt and add wavy lines to the sides.

lines.text: Cut two wavy lines out of your pink felt and place one end a couple of inches below the neck hole and the other end a couple of inches above the end of the bacon. Sew on your bacon fat.
lines.text_raw: Cut two wavy lines out of your pink felt and place one end a couple of inches below the neck hole and the other end a couple of inches above the end of the bacon. Sew on your bacon fat.

lines.text: Add a mini bacon by following the same steps, but scaling down the bacon to fit your small fry.
lines.text_raw: Add a mini bacon by following the same steps, but scaling down the bacon to fit your small fry.

lines.text: Add a few trophies and you are Breakfast of Champions.
lines.text_raw: Add a few trophies and you are Breakfast of Champions.

guide.summary: Here are two adorable and funny costumes you can easily spin out of one project, Eggs and Bacon and Breakfast of Champions. Want to include your small-fry? I show you how to scale down the measurements for your dog or kiddo.
guide.title: Eggs and Bacon Halloween Costume
